params.DAO: The administrator of this contract (intended to be ZivoeDAO).

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

params.amounts: The amounts of "assets" to migrate, corresponds to "assets" by position in array.

params.amount: The amount of $ZVE to push to this locker.
params.asset: The asset to push to this locker (in this case $ZVE).

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

params.amounts: The amounts of "assets" to migrate, corresponds to "assets" by position in array.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setExponentialDecayPerSecond(uint256).details: For 1.0000% decrease per second, _exponentialDecayPerSecond would be (1 - 0.01) * RAY.For 0.0001% decrease per second, _exponentialDecayPerSecond would be (1 - 0.000001) * RAY.

params._exponentialDecayPerSecond: The updated value for exponentialDecayPerSecond state variable.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnershipAndLock(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateDistributionRatioBIPS(uint256[3]).details: The sum of distributionRatioBIPS[0], distributionRatioBIPS[1], and distributionRatioBIPS[2] must equal BIPS.

params._distributionRatioBIPS: The updated values for the state variable distributionRatioBIPS.

canPush().notice: Permission for owner to call pushToLocker().

decay(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the amount remaining after a decay.

pullFromLocker(address).notice: Migrates entire ERC20 balance from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC721(address,uint256,byt.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMulti(address[]).notice: Migrates full amount of ERC20s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint.notice: Migrates ERC721s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiPartial(address[],uin.notice: Migrates specific amounts of ERC20s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerPartial(address,uint256).notice: Migrates specific amount of ERC20 from locker to owner().

pushToLocker(address,uint256).notice: Allocates ZVE from the DAO to this locker for emissions, automatically forwards 50% of ZVE to emissions schedule.

pushToLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],ui.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerERC721(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerMulti(address[],uint256[]).notice: Migrates specific amounts of ERC20s from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint25.notice: Migrates ERC721s from owner() to locker.

setExponentialDecayPerSecond(uint256).notice: Updates the exponentialDecayPerSecond variable with provided input.

updateDistributionRatioBIPS(uint256[3]).notice: Updates the distribution between rewards contract, in BIPS.

@dev The ZivoeGlobals contract.
@dev The block.timestamp value of last distribution.
@notice Permission for owner to call pushToLocker().
@notice Forwards $ZVE available for distribution.

@notice This handles the accounting for forwarding ZVE to lockers privately.
 @param amount The amount of $ZVE to distribute.

@notice This contract facilitates an exponential decay emissions schedule for $ZVE.
         This contract has the following responsibilities:
           - Handles accounting (with governable variables) to support emissions schedule.
           - Forwards $ZVE to all ZivoeRewards contracts at will (stZVE, stSTT, stJTT).
